name: blockchain-freelancing-platform
description: A decentralized freelancing platform built on blockchain technology

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:contracts"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:contracts
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mainnet
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:contracts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:contracts
scripts.clean:contracts: cd contracts && rm -rf node_modules artifacts cache

author: Blockchain Freelancing Platform Team
